name: BoxFan
0:
”Alexa, open Box Fan”
”Alexa, play Box Fan”
”Alexa, ask Box Fan to play”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: box fan
des: The Box Fan sleep aid is brought to you by one of the world’s top sleep and relaxation artists. This ultra premium box fan sound is taken directly from the album “Box Fan” which is used by thousands to aid in sleep and relaxation each night. Now, for the first time, the relaxation power of Box Fan is available on your Alexa device. Box Fan is specifically engineered to help you get to and stay asleep by using a custom equalized recording of a real Box Fan.HOW TO USE: To use Box Fan: Say “Alexa, Play Box Fan” Once running, Box fan will automatically loop all night, or until you say 'Alexa, stop'. UNINTERUPTED PLAY: Box Fan premium service includes all night play (5hr instead of 1hr loops) and high quality sound.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
